title: useRef for DOM Access
instructions:
Create a component that uses useRef to interact with DOM elements.

Requirements:
1. Create a text input with a ref attached
2. Add a 'Focus Input' button that focuses the input when clicked
3. Add a 'Select All' button that selects all text in the input
4. Display a render count that persists across renders (using useRef)

useRef returns a mutable ref object whose .current property can hold any value. Unlike state, changing a ref doesn't trigger a re-render.
